issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [http://youtube.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fyoutube.com) ### Comment > This has only been an issue within the last couple days. The ads are still blocked, but now YouTube sees the adblocker is there. I’m unsure of if I will be able to play videos after taking this screenshot, but if it is blocked, I may be unable to watch YouTube on iPad until it’s fixed. ### Screenshots

As for the media player in the article, it was not resolved. However, sending the issue resolves it. So I create an issue. > > P.S. I check whether the issue I created has been resolved by accessing the website after a while. I haven't seen the issue page on Github. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
@Alex-302
> @hui1601
> 
> > I can block this ad by adding google.com###google-s-ad to the user rules.
> 
> Hi. Could you please show HTML code? I can't reproduce with Korean and European IPs.

Yes, here is a Devtool screenshot
After updating the filter again, the ads disappeared. thank you :)

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/143471793/d4ac9a2d-ccc9-41fb-bae0-fd7ec2af3dfa)

issue.title: comedy-radio.ru
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://comedy-radio.ru/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcomedy-radio.ru%2F) ### Comment > Также перед открытием данной страницы появляется реклама которую можно закрыть только через 4 секунды. Проблема проявляется только с этим сайтом во всех браузерах chrome, встроенный браузер mi и opera. Все действия которые прописаны в фак выполнил, но ничего не изменилось.
